bio:
I am a web developer with a wide array of skills, a broad knowledge base from which to draw from and many years of experience working with the web.

I have worked in a number of environments from startups just getting off the ground taking new ideas and shaping them to a workable prototype, to coming in to fine tune performance issues and make enhancements to established sites. I have worked to help build online businesses and refocus their strategies to crafting effective search engine optimization efforts and written both content and documentation for all of the above throughout.

At the highest levels, I feel that I have a great understanding of how to approach online businesses and at other levels lots of experience in the nitty gritty details of implementation, from the architecture and hardware, to databases design and performance, to writing well crafted code following industry standard best practices.

Overall this makes for a well rounded, mature perspective when it comes to d

abstrac: Over 15 years in Web Dev: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, .NET Developer
bio:
16 years experience with PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, CSS and HTML. Additional experience with Flash/ActionScript 2 & 3, Java, .NET, C# and MS SQL.
Scripting and Programming: PHP, MySQL, .NET (C#, VB and MS SQL), HTML, DHTML, XHTML, AJAX, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Perl, XML, XSLT, C, Objective-C

Software: Eclipse (with plugins for most programming languages), MS Visual Studio, Team Suite, Visual Source Safe, MS Web Matrix, Dreamweaver, FrontPage, Adobe Flash, Adobe Director, Subversion and Tortoise SVN, NetBeans IDE, Crystal Reports, MS Visio, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere, AfterEffects), 3D StudioMax (basics), Blender (Open Source animation software), Google SketchUp, Digidesign ProTools, Logic Audio Platinum, Sonic Foundry’s Sound Forge, Sonic Foundry’s Vegas Video, Cakewalk Pro Audio, Steinberg's Cubase, Propellerhead's Reason, Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, Power Point, Publisher and Visio, Open Office

Server and Net
I am available by phone and email throughout the week, often on the weekends. Bugs sometimes surface weeks after deployment, and I support my work for the original features and platform.
